sentences.english: The gift was returned to its 70-something-year-old sender in the southern port city of Busan the same day.
sentences.chinese: 当日，这份礼物被退回给釜山市年逾七旬的寄件人。

sentences.english: North Korean forces attempted to break through the Pusan perimeter.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜势力企图突破釜山周长。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Pusan on KA.
sentences.chinese: 港龙航空公司来回香港至釜山机票。

sentences.english: A woman takes in some rays on the sands of Haeundae beach in Busan, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 一名女子在釜山海云台沙滩晒日光浴，韩国。

sentences.english: According to Busan Regional Meteorological Agency statistics, this is the lowest in 96 years.
sentences.chinese: 据釜山地方气象厅统计，这是96年来最低。

sentences.english: There are 4 Busan International Airport lounges within our program.
sentences.chinese: 我们在釜山机场有4间机场贵宾室。

sentences.english: Mr. Nam-sik Hur, president of TPO, mayor of Busan is invited to deliver a speech.
sentences.chinese: 请担任TPO会长的釜山市市长许南植先生讲话。

sentences.english: The day of the southern port city of Busan, the lowest temperature of minus 12 degrees Celsius.
sentences.chinese: 南部港口城市釜山当天最低气温零下12摄氏度。

sentences.english: After cremation, Lee Eon's remains will be buried in his hometown - Busan.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，李炎的遗体于火葬后将安置于故乡釜山。

sentences.english: "Memory - Imagination - Fun, " Gana Art, Busan, Korea.
sentences.chinese: 娱乐》，卡娜阿特画廊，韩国釜山。

sentences.english: See you at the next Asian Games in Pusan, South Korea 2002.
sentences.chinese: 在釜山在下一个亚洲运动会看见你，南朝鲜2002。
